long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your ordinary new tab page into an extraordinary visual journey with ParticleNTP. This Chrome extension brings the mesmerizing power of Particles.js (https://vincentgarreau.com/particles.js/) to your browser, immersing you in a world of captivating and interactive particle effects. Move, click and tap, the particles will respond to your actions.

This extension replaces your new tab page with Particles.js, as shown here: https://vincentgarreau.com/particles.js/
